name: Bunker Maze
description:
Bunker maze is a physics based puzzle action platformer. You have to find your way through an abandoned bunker and jump from room to room by using teleporters. You will face a lot of unstable platforms and boxes. Sometimes you have to destroy them, sometimes you'll have to use them.

This is my Ludum Dare 49 submission. Please rate and comment under https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/49/bunker-maze.
